actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 101-244.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 461.
Senate agreed to companion measure H.CON.RES. 251 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a dedication ceremony incident to the placement of a bust of Lajos Kossuth in the Capitol and authorizing the printing of a transcript of the proceedings of the ceremony.

summary.text: Authorizes the Joint Committee on the Library to use the Rotunda of the Capitol on an appropriate date in March 1990 for a dedication ceremony and placement of a bust of Lajos Kossuth. Requires the transcript of the ceremony proceedings to be printed as a House document.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a dedication ceremony incident to the placement of a bust of Lajos Kossuth in the Capitol and authorizing the printing of a transcript of the proceedings of the ceremony.
